feed.title: Abacus Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.12.4
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.12.4 will be available here:

  • iOS: apps.apple.com/us/app/1627093491
  • Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=abacus.fireflyiii.android.app

Breaking changes

  • You will need to re-authenticate Abacus to use the new Credentials system.

What's Changed

  • version/0.12.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/249
  • New transaction search bar https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/issues/103
    • Type filter
    • Currency filter
  • Support for multiple accounts and "Credentials" screens https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/issues/235
  • Vietnamese translation https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/247 by @catmandx
  • Enhancement on transaction form for required account (dest/source) https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/248 by @br0tda

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.11.2...0.12.4

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.13.2
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.13.2 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • Accept HTTP unsecured requests #256, #257
  • Fix transactions created do not appear in the app #252
  • New credentials login automatically #251
  • New custom UI library and deprecation of native base
  • version/0.13.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/262

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.12.4...0.13.2

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.15.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.15.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • Hide inactive bills #274
  • Display error message for transactions #265
  • New filters for Transactions list: Account & From Date
  • version/0.15.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/273

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.14.0...0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.16.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.16.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • new: EXPO SDK 51 #285
  • fix bug: Login redirection loop #270
  • fix bug: Transaction source account cannot be edited #282
  • italian translations by @maramazza in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/278
  • russian translations by @NiteNeal in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/283

New Contributors

  • @maramazza made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/278

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.15.0...0.16.0
